actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a credit for taxpayers who make contributions to individuals eligible for social security benefits.

summary.text: Retirement Assistance Act of 1982 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide an income tax credit equal to the amount a taxpayer contributes to an individual who waives his right to receive social security benefits or returns an amount equal to one half of the value of any such benefit received.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a credit for taxpayers who make contributions to individuals eligible for social security benefits.
